title: Vox Machina Ep. 29 - Whispers
description: Vox Machina begin their campaign to sow the seeds of rebellion amongst the people of Whitestone. The cruel Sir. Kerrion Stonefell is the first target on their list, but will the attack against him unleash a darker power?
